tool_description: Reviews generated product content for quality, compliance, brand guidelines, and accuracy before publication approval.

content_text.description: Product content text to review for quality and compliance

review_criteria.description: Review aspects to check: grammar, brand_voice, accuracy, compliance, readability

brand_guidelines.description: Brand voice style: professional, casual, technical, or friendly

error_messages: Empty content: content_text cannot be empty for review
Invalid review criteria: Use valid criteria from [grammar, brand_voice, accuracy, compliance, readability]
Invalid brand guidelines: Use one of [professional, casual, technical, friendly]
Review incomplete: Unable to complete review due to content format issues
usage: Provide content_text and specify review_criteria array; optionally set brand_guidelines for consistent brand voice evaluation.

approval_status.description: Review outcome: approved, requires_revision, or rejected
